lead_paragraph: A picture caption on Saturday with an article about Tony Kubek, the former baseball analyst who was honored by the Hall of Fame over the weekend, referred incorrectly to the image of him in a stadium broadcast booth. It was taken at some point before the 1974 All-Star Game, not at the game or even at the same stadium. (The picture appears to have been taken in Kansas City; the 1974 All-Star Game was in Pittsburgh.).
